title: Looking for noobs
body:
Looking for other noobs to play with. Currently level 18.

Typical Level 5 mastery 47.1k champ points on _**Master yi**_

Free to join and Q with me :)

**Why you should join me:**
No surveys, Free

Would be lovely if you had teamspeak.

Get it at teamspeak3.com

replies.body:
there might be a few in the mirror
edit: just teasing
more than happy to join :D returning player to league, no teamspeak but get on curse, its better
Add me if you want to play some games! :)
